docs.title: DataGEMS Query Recommender Api
docs.text:
This is the documentation site for the DataGEMS Query Recommender Api. The service is part of the wider DataGEMS platform. This is part of the overall platform documentation.

The Query Recommender Api service recommends 3 possible next queries to the user based on their current query and past behavior.

You can use the menu options on the left to navigate through the available documentation. You may be interested to jump directly to an Architecture Overview, read about some Api Constructs, investigate how to interpret Status & Error Codes or jump straight in to the OpenAPI Reference. You can find the repository for the service here: code repository.

For any questions, you can consult the FAQ, check if there is a relevant issue answering your question or contact the DataGEMS Help Desk.

docs.title: POST /api/v1/recommend-next-queries
docs.text:
Recommend Next Queries

Request body

application/json 

{
    "current_query": "string",
    "context": null
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the request body 
{
    "properties": {
        "current_query": {
            "type": "string",
            "title": "Current Query"
        },
        "context": {
            "anyOf": [
                {},
                {
                    "type": "null"
                }
            ],
            "title": "Context"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "required": [
        "current_query"
    ],
    "title": "QueryRequest"
}

Response 200 OK

application/json 

{
    "next_queries": [
        "string"
    ]
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "properties": {
        "next_queries": {
            "items": {
                "type": "string"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "title": "Next Queries"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "required": [
        "next_queries"
    ],
    "title": "QueryResponse"
}

Response 422 Unprocessable Content

application/json 

{
    "detail": [
        {
            "loc": [
                null
            ],
            "msg": "string",
            "type": "string"
        }
    ]
}
⚠️ This example has been generated automatically from the schema and it is not accurate. Refer to the schema for more information.

Schema of the response body 
{
    "properties": {
        "detail": {
            "items": {
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ValidationError"
            },
            "type": "array",
            "title": "Detail"
        }
    },
    "type": "object",
    "title": "HTTPValidationError"
}
